attributes.additional_details:
I see now that the Conservatives with the liberals  are considering allowing Syrian refugees into the UK that is ok if you house them on your street but you wont it will be on my street or someone else's street can you not see Cameron ... we are fed up with more immigrants they take our taxes spend our taxes on us the people who pay them, you are inviting extremists and no doubt they will end up killing some people in the UK  .. if one refugee comes from Syria you must insist that the £500,000,000 you have paid to aid then that should be returned .. if you want Syrian refugees you take them to your home if not ask us the British do we want them ...?????   do not force them on us or pay for them out of your own pocket if it your decision... the next election can not come soon enough ...  I have voted for you always not ever again ….then it will be good bye David
John Workman Tax payer and Voter
